    • Simulation from species 1 life history

compile pairwise relationships from the samples

compile_related_pairs.Rd

Run this on some of the output from slurp_spip().

compile_related_pairs(S)

Arguments

S

a tibble that must have the columns:

  • ID: the id of the sample

  • ancestors: a list column of the ancestor vectors of each individual

  • relatives: a list column of the vectors of individual samples (including self) that each indvidual is related to.

Value

a tibble with columns id_1 and id_2 for each pair. Any additional columns outside of relatives will be joined with _1 and _2 suffixes. There are other columns in the return too.... More later.

Contents
